### Problem 1
``` {r count and find means}
ICE <- read_csv("IceCream.csv")
#alpha = 0.1 df=200-1=199
ICE %>% glimpse
ICE %>% count(Puzzle)
mean(ICE$Puzzle) 
sd(ICE$Puzzle)
qt(0.05,199)
tsum.test(mean(ICE$Puzzle), sd(ICE$Puzzle), 200)$conf.int

```
